拔.definition: to pull up; to pull out; to draw out by suction; to select; to pick; to stand out (above level); to surpass; to seize

拔出蘿蔔帶出泥.pinyin: ba2 chu1 luo2 bo5 dai4 chu1 ni2
拔出蘿蔔帶出泥.definition: lit. when you pull a radish out of the ground, some dirt comes up with it (idiom); fig. to uncover, during the investigation of a crime, evidence of other crimes; to cause further problems while working on a problem

拔刀相助.definition: see 路見不平，拔刀相助|路见不平，拔刀相助[lu4 jian4 bu4 ping2 , ba2 dao1 xiang1 zhu4]

拔取.definition: to pick out; to select and recruit; to pluck; to pull

拔地.definition: to rise steeply from level ground

拔尖.definition: top-notch (colloquial); to push oneself to the front

拔尖兒.definition: erhua variant of 拔尖[ba2 jian1]

拔掉.definition: to pluck; to pull off; to pull out; to unplug

拔擢.definition: select the best people for promotion

拔根汗毛比腰粗.pinyin: ba2 gen1 han4 mao2 bi3 yao1 cu1
拔根汗毛比腰粗.definition: lit. a hair plucked from (person A) would be thicker than (person B)'s waist (idiom); fig. A is far richer (or more powerful) than B; (used in a pattern such as A拔根汗毛比B的腰粗[A ba2 gen1 han4 mao2 bi3 B de5 yao1 cu1])

拔毒.definition: draw out pus by applying a plaster to the affected area

拔毛.definition: to pull out hair; to pluck; epilation

拔毛連茹.definition: lit. pull up a plant and the roots follow (idiom); fig. also involving others; inextricably tangled together; Invite one and he'll tell all his friends.

拔河.definition: tug-of-war; to take part in a tug-of-war

拔火罐.definition: (TCM) to cup; to give a cupping treatment; short detachable stove chimney used to help draw fire

拔火罐兒.definition: erhua variant of 拔火罐[ba2 huo3 guan4]

拔示巴.definition: Bathsheba, wife of Uriah the Hittite and later of David (according to the Hebrew Bible)

拔絲.definition: wire drawing; candied floss (cooking); spun sugar or toffee (coating)

拔罐.definition: cupping glass; fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin); ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)

拔罐法.definition: fire cupping (acupressure technique of Chinese medicine, with fired vacuum cup applied to the skin); ventouse (vacuum method used in obstetrics)

拔苗助長.definition: to spoil things through excessive enthusiasm (idiom)

拔茅茹.definition: lit. pull up a plant and the roots follow; fig. also involving others; inextricably tangled together; Invite one and he'll tell all his friends.

拔茅連茹.definition: lit. pull up a plant and the roots follow (idiom); fig. also involving others; inextricably tangled together; Invite one and he'll tell all his friends.

拔萃.definition: to distinguish oneself; to be of outstanding talent

拔高.definition: to raise (one's voice); to overrate; to build up; to stand out; outstanding
